com.foreach.across.modules.webcms.domain.endpoint.web.interceptor

Class WebCmsEndpointHandlerInterceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.servlet.handler.HandlerInterceptorAdapter
      • com.foreach.across.modules.webcms.domain.endpoint.web.interceptor.WebCmsEndpointHandlerInterceptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.web.servlet.AsyncHandlerInterceptor, org.springframework.web.servlet.HandlerInterceptor

    public class WebCmsEndpointHandlerInterceptor
extends org.springframework.web.servlet.handler.HandlerInterceptorAdapter
    Interceptor for basic WebCmsUrl and WebCmsEndpoint handling.

    • sets the status code of the WebCmsUrl on the HttpServletResponse
    • sets the X-WCM-Preview header when previewing an endpoint
    • will apply the default template as view if one is set as request attribute (DEFAULT_TEMPLATE_ATTRIBUTE and the handler method has a void return type

    This interceptor also listens to the BuildTemplateWebResourcesEvent and will register preview related web resources when in preview mode.

    Since:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Sander Van Loock, Arne Vandamme
    See Also:
    WebCmsEndpointControllerAdvice, IgnoreEndpointModel
